trans-unit.source: Validates expression conditions.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> class using the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
The type of the object that this <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> or <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> will be executed against.
Normally it is the workflow, but it can be any valid type.
An optional <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider"></xref> implementation that is used to determine what <xref href="System.Type"></xref>s are available in the condition.
If one is not specified, only types in the assembly specified by the activity and any assemblies it references are available.
thisType is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> and the type provider.
This constructor is used at design time.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in which context the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> or <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> is run.
In most cases, this will be the workflow object.
An optional <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider"></xref> implementation that is used to determine what <xref href="System.Type"></xref>s are available in the condition.
If one is not specified, only types in the assembly specified by the activity and any assemblies it references are available.

If `true`, the types used by any <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> or <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> that are validated with this object must be in the restricted list of types allowed.
activity is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets the errors associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError"></xref> objects created during rule validation.
Determines the type of the code expression.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> to evaluate.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionInfo"></xref> for the object.
This identifies the type of the object.
Removes and returns the parent expressions at the top of the <xref href="System.Collections.Stack"></xref>.
Inserts an object at the top of the <xref href="System.Collections.Stack"></xref>.
If the `newParent` is already part of the parent <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> objects, a new <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError> is created.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Collections.Stack"></xref>.
`true` if the newParent was added to the stack; otherwise, `false`.
newParent is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets the type of object.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the object.
